TypeSignature.Value: public struct Boolean : IComparable, IComparable<bool>, IConvertible, IEquatable<bool>

.class public sequential ansi serializable sealed beforefieldinit bool extends System.ValueType implements class System.IComparable, class System.IComparable`1<bool>, class System.IConvertible, class System.IEquatable`1<bool>
Public Structure Boolean Implements IComparable, IComparable(Of Boolean), IConvertible, IEquatable(Of Boolean)
public value class Boolean : IComparable, IComparable<bool>, IConvertible, IEquatable<bool>

summary.span: Represents a Boolean ( or ) value.

span.span: Represents a Boolean ( or ) value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks A執行個體可以有兩個值： `true`，或`false`。A instance can have either of two values: `true`, or `false`. 結構會提供方法，可支援下列工作：The structure provides methods that support the following tasks: - 將布林值轉換為字串： Converting Boolean values to strings: - 剖析字串以將它們轉換成布林值：和 Parsing strings to convert them to Boolean values: and - 比較值：和 Comparing values: and 下列各節說明這些工作，以及其他使用方式詳細資料：The following sections explain these tasks and other usage details: [格式化的布林值](#Formatting) [Formatting Boolean values](#Formatting) [布林值的來回轉換](#Converting) [Converting to and from Boolean values](#Converting) [剖析布林值](#Parsing) [Parsing Boolean values](#Parsing) [比較的布林值](#Comparing) [Comparing Boolean values](#Comparing) [使用布林值，當做二進位值](#Binary) [Working with Booleans as binary values](#Binary) [執行布林值作業](#Operations) [Performing operations with Boolean values](#Operations) [布林值和 InteropBooleans and Interop](#Interop) ## 格式化的布林值Formatting Boolean values 字串表示法為"True"`true`的值或"False"`false`值。The string representation of a is either "True" for a `true` value or "False" for a `false` value. 字串表示法值由所定義的唯讀和欄位。The string representation of a value is defined by the read-only and fields. 您使用方法，將布林值轉換成字串。You use the method to convert Boolean values to strings. 布林值的結構包含兩個多載： 無參數方法和方法，其中包含控制格式設定的參數。The Boolean structure includes two overloads: the parameterless method and the method, which includes a parameter that controls formatting. 不過，因為會忽略這個參數，兩個多載會產生相同的字串。However, because this parameter is ignored, the two overloads produce identical strings. 方法不支援區分文化特性格式。The method does not support culture-sensitive formatting. 下列範例說明格式化與方法。The following example illustrates formatting with the method. 請注意，此範例會使用[複合格式](~/docs/standard/base-types/composite-formatting.md)功能，因此隱含地呼叫方法。Note that the example uses the [composite formatting](~/docs/standard/base-types/composite-formatting.md) feature, so the method is called implicitly. [!code-csharp[System.Boolean.Structure#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.boolean.structure/cs/tostring1.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Boolean.Structure#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.boolean.structure/vb/tostring1.vb#3)] 因為結構可以有只有兩個值，就可以輕鬆地新增自訂的格式設定。Because the structure can have only two values, it is easy to add custom formatting. 簡單自訂格式中的另一個字串常值會取代為"True"和"False"，您可以使用任何條件式評估功能，支援您的語言，例如[條件式運算子](~/docs/csharp/language-reference/operators/conditional-operator.md)以 C# 或[如果運算子](~/docs/visual-basic/language-reference/operators/if-operator.md)Visual Basic 中。For simple custom formatting in which other string literals are substituted for "True" and "False", you can use any conditional evaluation feature supported by your language, such as the [conditional operator](~/docs/csharp/language-reference/operators/conditional-operator.md) in C# or the [If operator](~/docs/visual-basic/language-reference/operators/if-operator.md) in Visual Basic. 下列範例會使用這項技術來格式化值為"Yes"和"No"而不是"True"和"False"。The following example uses this technique to format values as "Yes" and "No" rather than "True" and "False". [!code-csharp[System.Boolean.Structure#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.boolean.structure/cs/tostring2.cs#4)] [!code-vb[System.Boolean.Structure#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.boolean.structure/vb/tostring2.vb#4)] 用於更複雜自訂格式化作業，包括 文化特性格式，您可以呼叫方法，並提供實作。For more complex custom formatting operations, including culture-sensitive formatting, you can call the method and provide an implementation. 下列範例會實作和介面，以英文 （美國）、 法文 （法國） 和俄文 （俄羅斯） 文化特性提供區分文化特性的布林值的字串。The following example implements the and interfaces to provide culture-sensitive Boolean strings for the English (United States), French (France), and Russian (Russia) cultures. [!code-csharp[System.Boolean.Structure#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.boolean.structure/cs/format3.cs#5)] [!code-vb[System.Boolean.Structure#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.boolean.structure/vb/format3.vb#5)] 或者，您可以使用[資源檔](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ad495d4-2941-40cf-bf64-e82e85825890)來定義特定文化特性的布林值的字串。Optionally, you can use [resource files](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ad495d4-2941-40cf-bf64-e82e85825890) to define culture-specific Boolean strings. ## 布林值的來回轉換Converting to and from Boolean values 結構實作介面。The structure implements the interface. 如此一來，您可以使用之間執行轉換的類別值，以及其他任何基本類型，.NET Framework 中，或者您可以呼叫結構的明確的實作。As a result, you can use the class to perform conversions between a value and any other primitive type in the .NET Framework, or you can call the structure's explicit implementations. 不過，之間的轉換和 下列類型不支援，因此對應的轉換方法會擲回例外狀況：However, conversions between a and the following types are not supported, so the corresponding conversion methods throw an exception: - 之間的轉換並(和方法)Conversion between and (the and methods) - 之間的轉換並(和方法)Conversion between and (the and methods) 從整數或浮點數的數字的所有轉換成布林值非零將值轉換成`true`與零值以`false`。All conversions from integral or floating-point numbers to Boolean values convert non-zero values to `true` and zero values to `false`. 下列範例將說明這藉由呼叫選取的多載類別。The following example illustrates this by calling selected overloads of the class. [!code-csharp[System.Boolean.Structure#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.boolean.structure/cs/conversion1.cs#6)] [!code-vb[System.Boolean.Structure#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.boolean.structure/vb/conversion1.vb#6)] 當從浮點值轉換成布林值，轉換方法會執行零的確實比較。When converting from floating-point values to Boolean values, the conversion methods perform an exact comparison with zero. 如果浮點數的值已經失去精確度，可能造成無法預期。If the floating-point value has lost precision, the result can be unexpected. 下列範例中，在其中所示其值應為零的變數會轉換成布林值。This is illustrated in the following example, in which a variable whose value should be zero is converted to a Boolean value. 如範例所示，結果就是`true`因為重複加入 0.2 導致失去精確度。As the example shows, the result is `true` because repeated additions of 0.2 have resulted in a loss of precision. 布林值轉換為數值，轉換的方法時類別轉換`true`為 1 和`false`設為 0。When converting from Boolean to numeric values, the conversion methods of the class convert `true` to 1 and `false` to 0. 不過，Visual Basic 轉換函式轉換`true`到任一 255 (轉換成值) 則為-1 （適用於所有其他數值轉換）。However, Visual Basic conversion functions convert `true` to either 255 (for conversions to values) or -1 (for all other numeric conversions). 下列範例會將轉換`true`為數值使用方法，並在 Visual Basic 範例中，使用 Visual Basic 語言的自己轉換運算子。The following example converts `true` to numeric values by using a method, and, in the case of the Visual Basic example, by using the Visual Basic language's own conversion operator. [!code-csharp[System.Boolean.Structure#8](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.boolean.structure/cs/conversion3.cs#8)] [!code-vb[System.Boolean.Structure#8](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.boolean.structure/vb/conversion3.vb#8)] 從轉換字串值，請參閱[格式化的布林值](#Formatting)一節。For conversions from to string values, see the [Formatting Boolean Values](#Formatting) section. 從字串轉換值，請參閱[剖析布林值](#Parsing)一節。For conversions from strings to values, see the [Parsing Boolean Values](#Parsing) section. ## 剖析布林值Parsing Boolean values 結構包含兩個靜態剖析方法，和，可將字串轉換成布林值。The structure includes two static parsing methods, and , that convert a string to a Boolean value. 布林值的字串表示的值不區分大小寫對等項目所定義和欄位，也就是"True"和"False"，分別。The string representation of a Boolean value is defined by the case-insensitive equivalents of the values of the and fields, which are "True" and "False", respectively. 換句話說，只有成功剖析的字串是"True"、"False"，"true"、"false"或某些混合大小寫對等項目。In other words, the only strings that parse successfully are "True", "False", "true", "false", or some mixed-case equivalent. 您無法成功剖析數值字串，例如"0"或"1"。You cannot successfully parse numeric strings such as "0" or "1". 執行字串比較時，不會考慮前置或尾端空格字元。Leading or trailing white-space characters are not considered when performing the string comparison. 下列範例會使用和方法剖析的字串數目。The following example uses the and methods to parse a number of strings. 請注意，只有不區分大小寫對等項目"True"和"False"可以成功剖析。Note that only the case-insensitive equivalents of "True" and "False" can be successfully parsed. [!code-csharp[System.Boolean.Structure#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.boolean.structure/cs/parse2.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Boolean.Structure#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.boolean.structure/vb/parse2.vb#2)] 如果您在 Visual Basic 進行程式設計，您可以使用`CBool`函式來將數字的字串表示轉換為布林值。If you are programming in Visual Basic, you can use the `CBool` function to convert the string representation of a number to a Boolean value. "0"會轉換成`false`，而任何非零值的字串表示轉換成`true`。"0" is converted to `false`, and the string representation of any non-zero value is converted to `true`. 如果您不在 Visual Basic 進行程式設計，您必須以數字轉換數字的字串，再將它轉換為布林值項目。If you are not programming in Visual Basic, you must convert your numeric string to a number before converting it to a Boolean. 下列範例會說明這藉由將整數的陣列轉換成布林值。The following example illustrates this by converting an array of integers to Boolean values. [!code-csharp[System.Boolean.Structure#9](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.boolean.structure/cs/parse3.cs#9)] [!code-vb[System.Boolean.Structure#9](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.boolean.structure/vb/parse3.vb#9)] ## 比較的布林值Comparing Boolean values 布林值都是因為`true`或是`false`，不太需要明確呼叫方法，即表示執行個體是否大於、 小於、 或等於指定的值。Because Boolean values are either `true` or `false`, there is little reason to explicitly call the method, which indicates whether an instance is greater than, less than, or equal to a specified value. 一般而言，若要比較兩個布林值變數，您呼叫方法或使用您語言的等號比較運算子。Typically, to compare two Boolean variables, you call the method or use your language's equality operator. 不過，當您想要比較的常值的布林值的布林值變數`true`或`false`，不需要執行明確的比較，因為評估的布林值的結果是布林值。However, when you want to compare a Boolean variable with the literal Boolean value `true` or `false`, it is not necessary to do an explicit comparison, because the result of evaluating a Boolean value is that Boolean value. 例如，運算式For example, the expressions [!code-csharp[System.Boolean.Structure#12](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.boolean.structure/cs/operations1.cs#12)] [!code-vb[System.Boolean.Structure#12](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.boolean.structure/vb/operations1.vb#12)] 和and [!code-csharp[System.Boolean.Structure#13](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.boolean.structure/cs/operations2.cs#13)] [!code-vb[System.Boolean.Structure#13](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.boolean.structure/vb/operations2.vb#13)] 為相等，但第二個而言較為精簡。are equivalent, but the second is more compact. 不過，這兩種技術會提供相當的效能。However, both techniques offer comparable performance. ## 使用布林值，當做二進位值Working with Booleans as binary values 布林值，會佔用一個位元組的記憶體，如下列 C# 範例所示。A Boolean value occupies one byte of memory, as the following C# example shows. 必須以編譯範例`/unsafe`切換。The example must be compiled with the `/unsafe` switch. [!code-csharp[System.Boolean.Structure#14](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.boolean.structure/cs/size1.cs#14)] 位元組的低序位位元用來代表它的值。The byte's low-order bit is used to represent its value. 值為 1 代表`true`; 的值為 0 就表示`false`。A value of 1 represents `true`; a value of 0 represents `false`. > [!WARNING] > 您可以使用結構使用的布林值的集合。You can use the structure to work with sets of Boolean values. 您可以將布林值轉換成其二進位表示法藉由呼叫方法。You can convert a Boolean value to its binary representation by calling the method. 方法會傳回具有單一元素位元組陣列。The method returns a byte array with a single element. 若要還原的布林值，從其二進位表示法，您可以呼叫方法。To restore a Boolean value from its binary representation, you can call the method. 下列範例會呼叫方法，將布林值轉換成二進位表示法及顯示的值，並接著呼叫的個別位元從其二進位表示法還原為值的方法。The following example calls the method to convert a Boolean value to its binary representation and displays the individual bits of the value, and then calls the method to restore the value from its binary representation. [!code-csharp[System.Boolean.Structure#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.boolean.structure/cs/binary1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Boolean.Structure#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.boolean.structure/vb/binary1.vb#1)] ## 執行布林值作業Performing operations with Boolean values 本章節將說明如何布林值會在應用程式。This section illustrates how Boolean values are used in apps. 第一節會討論其用途為旗標。The first section discusses its use as a flag. 第二個說明算術運算的用法。The second illustrates its use for arithmetic operations. ### 布林值旗標Boolean values as flags 布林值變數是最常用於為旗標，表示某個條件存在。Boolean variables are most commonly used as flags, to signal the presence or absence of some condition. 例如，在方法中，最後一個參數， `ignoreCase`，表示兩個字串比較是否不區分大小寫的旗標 (`ignoreCase`是`true`) 或區分大小寫 (`ignoreCase`是`false`)。For example, in the method, the final parameter, `ignoreCase`, is a flag that indicates whether the comparison of two strings is case-insensitive (`ignoreCase` is `true`) or case-sensitive (`ignoreCase` is `false`). 然後在條件陳述式評估的旗標值。The value of the flag can then be evaluated in a conditional statement. 下列範例會使用簡單的主控台應用程式，來說明為旗標的布林值變數使用。The following example uses a simple console app to illustrate the use of Boolean variables as flags. 應用程式會接受命令列參數可讓輸出重新導向至指定的檔案 (`/f`切換)，並可讓輸出傳送至指定的檔案和主控台 (`/b`切換)。The app accepts command-line parameters that enable output to be redirected to a specified file (the `/f` switch), and that enable output to be sent both to a specified file and to the console (the `/b` switch). 應用程式定義名為旗標`isRedirected`來指示是否輸出傳送至檔案，以及旗標，名為`isBoth`表示輸出都應該傳送至主控台。The app defines a flag named `isRedirected` to indicate whether output is to be sent to a file, and a flag named `isBoth` to indicate that output should be sent to the console. [!code-csharp[System.Boolean.Structure#10](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.boolean.structure/cs/operations1.cs#10)] [!code-vb[System.Boolean.Structure#10](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.boolean.structure/vb/operations1.vb#10)] ### 布林值和算術運算Booleans and arithmetic operations 布林值，有時可用來指出觸發數學計算的條件存在。A Boolean value is sometimes used to indicate the presence of a condition that triggers a mathematical calculation. 比方說，`hasShippingCharge`變數可能會做為旗標，指出是否要加入發票量的費用。For example, a `hasShippingCharge` variable might serve as a flag to indicate whether to add shipping charges to an invoice amount. 因為作業`false`值沒有任何作用上作業的結果，它不需要將此布林值轉換成在數學運算中使用整數值。Because an operation with a `false` value has no effect on the result of an operation, it is not necessary to convert the Boolean to an integral value to use in the mathematical operation. 相反地，您可以使用條件式邏輯。Instead, you can use conditional logic. 下列範例會計算包含小計、 出貨費用，以及選擇性的服務費用的金額。The following example computes an amount that consists of a subtotal, a shipping charge, and an optional service charge. `hasServiceCharge`變數可讓您決定是否要套用服務費用。The `hasServiceCharge` variable determines whether the service charge is applied. 而不是轉換`hasServiceCharge`數值和乘以服務電量，此範例會使用條件式邏輯加入服務費用金額，如果適用的話。Instead of converting `hasServiceCharge` to a numeric value and multiplying it by the amount of the service charge, the example uses conditional logic to add the service charge amount if it is applicable. [!code-csharp[System.Boolean.Structure#13](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.boolean.structure/cs/operations2.cs#13)] [!code-vb[System.Boolean.Structure#13](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.boolean.structure/vb/operations2.vb#13)] ### 布林值和 interopBooleans and interop 通常直接了當，封送處理至 COM 的基底資料類型時資料型別為例外狀況。While marshaling base data types to COM is generally straightforward, the data type is an exception. 您可以套用封送處理的屬性任何下列的表示法的型別：You can apply the attribute to marshal the type to any of the following representations: |列舉類型Enumeration type|Unmanaged 的格式Unmanaged format| |----------------------|----------------------| ||4 位元組的整數值，其中任何非零值都代表`true`並且 0 代表`false`。A 4-byte integer value, where any nonzero value represents `true` and 0 represents `false`. 這是預設的格式為欄位中的結構和平台中的參數叫用呼叫。This is the default format of a field in a structure and of a parameter in platform invoke calls.| ||1 位元整數值，其中 1 代表`true`並且 0 代表`false`。A 1-byte integer value, where the 1 represents `true` and 0 represents `false`.| ||2 位元組的整數值，其中-1 代表`true`並且 0 代表`false`。A 2-byte integer value, where -1 represents `true` and 0 represents `false`. 這是預設的格式為在 COM interop 呼叫的參數。This is the default format of a parameter in COM interop calls.|

threadsafe.span: 此型別的所有成員都是安全執行緒。

span.span: All members of this type are thread safe.

threadsafe.span: 若要修改執行個體狀態會顯示的成員實際上會傳回新的值進行初始化的新執行個體。

span.span: Members that appear to modify instance state actually return a new instance initialized with the new value.

threadsafe.span: 為與任何其他型別，讀取和寫入共用的變數，其中包含這個型別的執行個體必須受到鎖定，以確保執行緒安全性。

span.span: As with any other type, reading and writing to a shared variable that contains an instance of this type must be protected by a lock to guarantee thread safety.

summary.span: Compares this instance to a specified object or object and returns an integer that indicates their relationship to one another.

span.span: Compares this instance to a specified object or object and returns an integer that indicates their relationship to one another.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會實作介面並執行稍微優於方法因為並沒有將`value`物件的參數。This method implements the interface and performs slightly better than the method because it does not have to convert the `value` parameter to an object. 如果`value`具有較少的位元 （較窄） 與執行個體類型，有些程式語言會執行隱含的擴展轉換，將參數的值轉換成具有更多的位元的值。If `value` has fewer bits (is narrower) than the instance type, some programming languages perform an implicit widening conversion that transforms the value of the parameter into a value with more bits. 例如，假設此執行個體類型是，且參數類型為。For example, suppose the instance type is and the parameter type is . Microsoft C# 編譯器會產生代表做為參數的值的指示物件，則會產生方法來比較執行個體和參數的表示法。The Microsoft C# compiler generates instructions to represent the value of the parameter as an object, then generates a method to compare the instance and parameter representation. 請參閱您的程式語言的文件，以判斷其編譯器是否會執行隱含的擴展轉換數值類型上。Consult your programming language's documentation to determine whether its compiler performs implicit widening conversions on numeric types. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範泛型和非泛型版本數的值和參考類型的方法。The following code example demonstrates generic and nongeneric versions of the method for several value and reference types. [!code-cpp[T.CompareTo#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/T.CompareTo/CPP/cat.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[T.CompareTo#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/T.CompareTo/CS/cat.cs#1)] [!code-vb[T.CompareTo#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/T.CompareTo/VB/cat.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會傳回"True"或"False"的常數。This method returns the constants "True" or "False". 請注意，XML 是區分大小寫，而且 XML 規格可辨識"true"和"false"做為一組有效的布林值。Note that XML is case-sensitive, and that the XML specification recognizes "true" and "false" as the valid set of Boolean values. 如果所傳回的字串方法會寫入至 XML 檔案，其應該先呼叫方法，將它轉換成小寫。If the string returned by the method is to be written to an XML file, its method should be called first to convert it to lowercase. ## Examples 下列範例說明方法。The following example illustrates the method. [!code-cpp[System.Boolean#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Boolean/CPP/booleanmembers.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Boolean#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Boolean/CS/booleanmembers.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Boolean#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Boolean/VB/booleanmembers.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks `provider`參數保留。The `provider` parameter is reserved. 不會參與此方法執行。It does not participate in the execution of this method. 這表示方法，不像大部分的方法與`provider`參數，不會反映特定文化特性設定。This means that the method, unlike most methods with a `provider` parameter, does not reflect culture-specific settings. 這個方法會傳回"True"或"False"的常數。This method returns the constants "True" or "False". 請注意，XML 是區分大小寫，而且 XML 規格可辨識"true"和"false"做為一組有效的布林值。Note that XML is case-sensitive, and that the XML specification recognizes "true" and "false" as the valid set of Boolean values. 如果所傳回的物件方法會寫入至 XML 檔案，其應該先呼叫方法，將它轉換成小寫。If the object returned by the method is to be written to an XML file, its method should be called first to convert it to lowercase.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法就像是方法，除了方法不會擲回例外狀況如果轉換失敗。The method is like the method, except the method does not throw an exception if the conversion fails. `value`參數可以前後加上空格。The `value` parameter can be preceded or followed by white space. 這個比較是序數和區分大小寫。The comparison is ordinal and case-insensitive. ## Examples 下列範例會呼叫方法來剖析字串的陣列。The following example calls the method to parse an array of strings. 請注意，剖析作業成功，才要剖析的字串為"True"(值欄位) 或"False"(值欄位) 中不區分大小寫的比較。Note that the parse operation succeeds only if the string to be parsed is "True" (the value of the field) or "False" (the value of the field) in a case-insensitive comparison. [!code-csharp[System.Boolean.TryParse#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.boolean.tryparse/cs/tryparseex.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Boolean.TryParse#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.boolean.tryparse/vb/tryparseex.vb#1)]
